DOC.brief_summary: A mixed method ( longitudinal , trajectory qualitative study ) provide comprehensive evidence impact e-cigarette use smoking quitting among smoke youth Hong Kong .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects cohort Youth Quitline caller smoke youth ( N=200 ) Hong Kong . The longitudinal study investigate effect baseline e-cigarette use quitting ( include relapse ) , nicotine addiction intention smoke 12-month telephone follow-up . A qualitative study conduct 10 ex- 10 current smoker supplement facilitate interpretation quantitative finding .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Ethnic Chinese 2 . Cantonese speaker 3 . Smoke least 1 cigarette past 30 day 1 . Psychologically physically unable communicate 2 . Undergoing smoke cessation programme
